prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Organ, Piano, Chromatic Percussion, Guitar, but without Synth Pad.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Organ, Piano, Chromatic Percussion, and Guitar, but no Synth Pad.

Style 2:
This song is comprised of Drums, Organ, Piano, Chromatic Percussion, and Guitar, omitting the Synth Pad.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Drums, Organ, Piano, Chromatic Percussion, and Guitar, excluding the Synth Pad.
